    "answer": "A = Length of Access fitting body, Pw = Pipe wall (wall thickness of pipe), Pd = Pipe diameter (outside diameter of pipe), El = Effective length of coupon (the portion of the coupon exposed to the environment, i.e. 3\" coupon = 1-5/8\", 6\" coupon = 4-3/4\"), Wg = Weld gap (per weld procedures, 1/16\" is normal per ANSI B31.1 1973)",
